pos_mean_info_list.mean: 意象派（1912年前后源于英美，主张主题和形式摆脱因袭之风）

bilingual.source: Insert a placeholder image until the final one is ready.
bilingual.target: 插入一个占位符图像，直到最终图像准备好。

bilingual.source: Rotate the image to fit the screen.
The image on the screen was blurry.

bilingual.target: 这张数字图像非常清晰。

bilingual.source: The image is stored as a bitmap.
bilingual.target: 这张图像以位图形式存储。

bilingual.source: The image on the screen was inverted.
bilingual.target: 屏幕上的图像是颠倒的。

bilingual.source: She saved the image to her desktop.
bilingual.target: 她把图像保存到了桌面上。
显示器清晰地显示图像。
这个镜头会导致图像畸变。

bilingual.source: Open the pcx file to view the image.
bilingual.target: 打开pcx（PC Paintbrush Exchange图像档格式）文件以查看图像。

list.abstract: image，英文单词，可作名词或动词，翻译为影像，意象，概念；反映，想象。

品牌介绍
IMAGE是日本著名的销售品牌，多年来作为不可缺少的时装元素已融入众多女性的生活中，为现代女性提供了全方位的，高品质，完美的实用方案。根据不同场合的需要提供的各种时尚搭配方案，是IMAGE的品牌专长。

yingyinNormal.en: And right in that first conversation, Kip showed me an image of that kind of classical fantasy image of these things and said, "This is all wrong. This is not how it is."
yingyinNormal.zh: 就在第一次谈话中，基普给我看了一张图像。图像就是这些东西的经典幻想图像，并且说“这全都不对”，“这不是它应该的样子”。

yingyinNormal.en: Wait. There's something embedded in the image on the poster. "You were right."
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，海报里植入了一个图像，你是对的。

yingyinNormal.en: So considering the following image.
yingyinNormal.zh: 想象一下这个画面。

yingyinNormal.en: Image number six: woman giving birth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 画面6: 妇女生产。

yingyinNormal.en: No visible reaction. Image number two: sousaphone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 无显著反应。画面2: 低音喇叭。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, but that image of you beside him is still bumping around the Internet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但你在他身边的形象依然可以在网上时不时看到。

yingyinNormal.en: We don't need to destroy her. Just the image. Then we let the people do the rest.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们根本没必要亲自动手，人们自会解决掉她。

yingyinNormal.en: The popular image of what a Wormhole might look like is literally just a hole in space.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对于虫洞看起来会是什么样的，通常形象是差不多就是太空里的一个洞。

yingyinNormal.en: No, but, it's just a funny image. You know, the two of you in this restaurant with the…
yingyinNormal.zh: 是不在，但想想都好笑，想想你们两个在这个餐馆，还...

yingyinNormal.en: Form a car speeding down the road. Speed up the image infinitely, then the car disappears.
yingyinNormal.zh: 假设一辆车在马路上奔驰，再把速度无限提高，车子就会消失。

yingyinNormal.en: Have you ever seen an image of the Roman emperor Claudius? Or the Hunnic ruler Attila? No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 您有见过罗马皇帝克劳迪亚斯的画像吗？或者匈奴王阿提拉的画像？没有。

yingyinNormal.en: We have always created icons in our own image. What we've done is we project ourselves onto him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们总是按自己的样子去塑造英雄，把自己投射到他身上。

yingyinNormal.en: You embarrassed me in front of my colleagues on my first day here. Image number five: kitten in a teacup.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你让我在同事面前很难堪还是在我来的第一天。画面5: 茶杯里的小猫。

yingyinNormal.en: Tell me where you took this photograph, what undoubtedly could be called the band's most well-known image?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是在哪里照的这张照片，这张可以说是那个乐队最著名的照片了。

yingyinNormal.en: Test subject D7, AKA Betsy, fear response study. Image number one: Frenchman on bicycle carrying baguettes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 测试D7，即Betsy恐惧反应研究，画面1: 骑车载着长面包的法国人。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm having enough trouble with the image of you and Susan together, when you throw in Tanya, I mean, yaw...
yingyinNormal.zh: 光想你和苏珊一起的样子我就够呛了，你要再把塔尼亚加进来，呃…

yingyinNormal.en: Still no reaction. Okay. Let's kick things up a notch. Image number three: crocodile with a mouthful of monkeys.
yingyinNormal.zh: 仍无反应。好吧，我们提高一级，画面3: 满嘴猴子的鳄鱼。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, if you stick one hand down your pants, you're the spitting image of Joey. Hey, I brought you some lunch.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果一只手放在裤袋里，你和乔伊没两样，我帮你买了午餐。

yingyinNormal.en: No one said that. We just want to... What? Protect the family image? Keep up this facade of perfection like you and Dad?
yingyinNormal.zh: 没人说要这样，我们就是想... 想怎样？维护家庭形象吗？像你和爸爸一样建立起完美的表象？

yingyinNormal.en: How clear is the image of me on that screen? Pretty clear. Do I look like I feel better? I mean, it's not, like, HD quality.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在屏幕上看我有多清晰呀？蛮清晰的。我看起来像有开心点吗？也没有到高清画质啦。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 印象; 形象; 想象
影像; 图像; 描绘

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 公共形象；公众形象；公共图像

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 想像中的；假想的；虚构的；幻想的；虚数的
n. 想象；想象力；创造力；幻想；创意力
adj. 可以想像到的
adj. 富有想象力的；拥有创造力的
v. 想象；假设；猜测；臆想；请想一想

word_family.mean: n. 形象；比喻；明喻；暗喻；像；镜像；相似；幻象

sense_info_list.en: the general impression that a person, organization, or product presents to the public
sense_info_list.zh: 印象; 形象; 想象

examination_example.sentence: They nudge the self-<highlight>image</highlight> of the city into a bolder and more optimistic light.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们将这座城市的自我形象渐渐推向了更大胆、更乐观的方向。

examination_example.sentence: Plus, whatever <highlight>image</highlight> we present is magnified by social-media services like LinkedIn.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，无论我们展示什么形象，都会被LinkedIn（领英）这样的社交媒体服务放大。

examination_example.sentence: Are you looking to refresh your <highlight>image</highlight> or pivot it?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你是想刷新你的形象还是想改变它？

sense_info_list.en: a representation of the external form of a person or thing in art
sense_info_list.zh: 影像; 图像; 描绘

examination_example.sentence: A number of companies, particularly in energy and transportation, use AI <highlight>image</highlight> processing technology to inspect infrastructure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多公司，特别是在能源和交通领域，使用人工智能图像处理技术来检查基础设施。

examination_example.sentence: How the whole <highlight>image</highlight> is then assembled and perceived is still a mystery although it is the subject of current research.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管整个图像是当前研究的主题，但它是如何被组合和感知的仍然是一个谜。

examination_example.sentence: Mauna Kea's peak rises above the bulk of our planet's dense atmosphere, where conditions allow telescopes to obtain <highlight>images</highlight> of unsurpassed clarity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 莫纳克亚山的顶峰高耸于地球大部分稠密的大气层之上，那里的条件使得望远镜能够获取无比清晰的图像。

word_usage.usage: image可指与picture意思相近的“图像”，也可指头脑中存在的“印象”。这两种情况下，image均为可数名词。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 影像; 图像; 雕像; 描绘; 刻画
印象; 形象; 想象

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 自我形象
n. 形象化的描述；比喻；意象；图像
adj. 想像中的；假想的；虚构的；幻想的；虚数的
n. 想象；想象力；创造力；幻想；创意力

adj. 富有想象力的；拥有创造力的
v. 想象；假设；猜测；臆想；请想一想

word_family.mean: n. 形象；比喻；明喻；暗喻；像；镜像；相似；幻象

sense_info_list.en: a representation of the external form of a person or thing in art
sense_info_list.zh: 影像; 图像; 雕像; 描绘; 刻画

examination_example.sentence: More CGI-recreated <highlight>images</highlight> of deceased celebrities are expected to appear on screen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 预计更多通过计算机成像技术（CGI）重现的已故名人的图像将出现在屏幕上。

examination_example.sentence: Should the public be allowed to use or reproduce <highlight>images</highlight> of famous people, given how iconic they are?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 鉴于名人的偶像性，公众是否应该被允许使用或复制他们的图像？

examination_example.sentence: The use of digital technology can bring <highlight>images</highlight> of deceased celebrities back to the screen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数字技术的使用可以将已故名人的影像重新搬上银幕。

examination_example.sentence: Algorithms that were right 95% of the time when they were dealing with a 13,000-<highlight>image</highlight> database.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当处理1.3万个图像数据时，算法的准确率达到了95%。

sense_info_list.en: the general impression that a person, organization, or product presents to the public
sense_info_list.zh: 印象; 形象; 想象

examination_example.sentence: The film is a way to keep the actor's <highlight>image</highlight> relevant for younger generations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这部电影是让演员的形象与年轻一代保持关联的一种方式。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>image</highlight> of James Dean will be recreated on screen with his voice dubbed by someone else.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 詹姆斯·迪恩（James Dean）的形象将通过他人配音在屏幕上重现。

examination_example.sentence: There is an ongoing debate among the public as to whether the <highlight>images</highlight> of deceased celebrities should be recreated.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公众中正在进行的辩论谈到是否应该再现已故名人的形象。

examination_example.sentence: This boosts the reputation and <highlight>image</highlight> of Adidas by making people more aware of the company's values.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过这种方式让更多消费者了解公司的价值理念，提升企业声誉，树立品牌形象。

sense_info_list.en: a representation of the external form of a person or thing in art
sense_info_list.zh: 影像; 图像; 雕像; 描绘; 刻画

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>image</highlight> appears to show a man carrying the dog in his arms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这张图像似乎显示了一名男子抱着狗。

examination_example.sentence: It uses paint to create anti-pollution <highlight>images</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它使用油漆来建造抗污染图像。

examination_example.sentence: In the <highlight>image</highlight>, the mother scolds the student with the words, "Shame on you!"
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在画中，这位母亲训斥学生：“真丢人！”

sense_info_list.en: the general impression that a person; organization; or product presents to the public
sense_info_list.zh: 印象; 形象; 想象

examination_example.sentence: As one of the most brutal predators (食肉动物) , killer whales may not fit the <highlight>image</highlight> of a cultured creature.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为最凶残的食肉动物之一，虎鲸或许与“有教养的生物”这一形象不符。

examination_example.sentence: The white clothing conveyed an <highlight>image</highlight> of cleanliness, according to Careme-and in his realm, appearance was everything.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据 Careme 的说法，白色衣服传达出干净的形象——在他的领域中，外表就是一切。

examination_example.sentence: It is a beautiful and uncharacteristically poetic <highlight>image</highlight> that Aristotle offers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 亚里士多德提供了一个美丽的、与众不同的诗意形象。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 画像; 雕像; 塑像
形象; 印象; 声誉

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 想像中的；假想的；虚构的；幻想的；虚数的
n. 想象；想象力；创造力；幻想；创意力
adj. 富有想象力的；拥有创造力的
v. 想象；假设；猜测；臆想；请想一想

word_family.mean: n. 形象；比喻；明喻；暗喻；像；镜像；相似；幻象

examination_example.sentence: "During the examination children don't move. It works perfectly. It's amazing," said Johanne L'Ecuyer, a medical-<highlight>imaging</highlight> technologist at the hospital.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “在检查过程中，孩子们不会动。它工作得很好。这太神奇了，”医院的医学成像技术专家约翰·莱奎尔说。

examination_example.sentence: A French medical-<highlight>imaging</highlight> technologist—also a hypnotist—was invited to train a few members in the medical-<highlight>imaging</highlight> department of the children's hospital.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一名法国医学成像技术专家——也是一名催眠师应邀在儿童医院的医学成像部门培训一些成员。

examination_example.sentence: An introduction of medical-<highlight>imaging</highlight> technology.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 医学影像技术导论。

sense_info_list.zh: 画像; 雕像; 塑像

examination_example.sentence: I used classical techniques, translated from my college days spent in the darkroom into Photoshop, to achieve the black-and-white <highlight>image</highlight> (图像).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我使用了经典的摄影技术，把我大学期间在暗室里冲洗的底片，导入Photoshop，得到了黑白图像。

examination_example.sentence: I can, from my computer at home, pull up satellite <highlight>images</highlight> of Juan's village.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我可以用家里的电脑调出Juan所在村庄的卫星图像。

examination_example.sentence: Many of the <highlight>images</highlight> were stored in an ice chest, under freezing water, in the damaged wooden ship.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多照片被保存在冰水中一艘破损木船的冰柜里。

sense_info_list.zh: 形象; 印象; 声誉

exam_freq_info.chinese: 镜像; 影像; 图像

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 身体形象；身体图像；身体意象

examination_example.sentence: A 2016 study in the UK suggested that body <highlight>image</highlight> lessons should be provided in schools.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国2016年的一项研究建议，学校应该提供身体形象课程。

examination_example.sentence: Body <highlight>image</highlight> problems don't disappear as we get older, either.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着年龄的增长，身体形象问题也不会消失。

examination_example.sentence: Everyone cares about his or her <highlight>image</highlight> (形象).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个人都在乎自己的形象。

sense_info_list.zh: 镜像; 影像; 图像

examination_example.sentence: I make a 3D <highlight>image</highlight> of the things around me for hundreds of feet in every direction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我制作了一张我周围数百英尺范围内各个方向的物体的3D影像。

examination_example.sentence: My brain then processes the sounds into <highlight>images</highlight> (图像).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后我的大脑将声音处理成图像。

examination_example.sentence: Sometimes, if you just look closely at an <highlight>image</highlight>, you can see if it has been changed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有时候，如果你仔细观察一幅图像，你就能看到它是否被改变了。
